title: Conjuring: Sous l'emprise du Diable (2021)
description: The Warrens investigate a murder that may be linked to a demonic possession.

title: Spirit: L'indomptable (2021)
description: Lucky Prescott's life is changed forever when she moves from her home in the city to a small frontier town and befriends a wild mustang named Spirit.

title: Under the Stadium Lights (2021)
description: Brother's Keeper is a true story about the '09 Abilene High School Football team.

title: The Education of Fredrick Fitzell (2020)
description: After a chance encounter with a man forgotten from his youth, Fred literally and metaphorically journeys into his past.

title: Tove (2020)
description: The movie centres on the life of Tove Jansson, showing both her personal relationships, and the creation of the popular Moomin books.

title: Monuments (2020)
description: A young widower sidesteps grief, loss, and familial dysfunction when he steals his wife's ashes and sets off on an impulsive odyssey through America's heartland to find something he'd lost long before her death.

title: Gully (2019)
description: Three teens living in LA, all victims of extreme childhoods, wreak a hedonistic riot across the city over the course of 48 hours, unbound by societal norms. They take us on a rip-roaring ride of drugs and murder across Los Angeles.

title: D'où l'on vient (2021)
description: A film version of the Broadway musical in which Usnavi, a sympathetic New York bodega owner, saves every penny every day as he imagines and sings about a better life.

title: Pierre Lapin 2: Panique en ville (2021)
description: Thomas and Bea are now married and living with Peter and his rabbit family. Bored of life in the garden, Peter goes to the big city, where he meets shady characters and ends up creating chaos for the whole family.

title: The House Next Door: Meet the Blacks 2 (2021)
description: When best selling author Carl Black moves his family back to his childhood home, he must team up with oddball neighbors to do battle with a pimp, who may or may not be an actual vampire.

title: Sublet (2020)
description: A New York Times travel writer comes to Tel Aviv after suffering a tragedy. The energy of the city and his relationship with a younger man brings him back to life.

title: Censor (2021)
description: After viewing a strangely familiar video nasty, Enid, a film censor, sets out to solve the past mystery of her sister's disappearance, embarking on a quest that dissolves the line between fiction and reality.

title: Queen Bees (2021)
description: After reluctantly agreeing to move in to a senior's home, a woman encounters a clique of mean-spirited women and an amorous widower.

title: The Unhealer (2020)
description: A botched faith healing bestows supernatural Shaman powers on a bullied teenager. When his lifelong tormentors pull a prank that kills someone he loves, he uses his powers for revenge and goes on a bloody rampage to settle the score.

title: The Misfits (2021)
description: After being recruited by a group of unconventional thieves, renowned criminal Richard Pace finds himself caught up in an elaborate gold heist that promises to have far-reaching implications on his life and the lives of countless others.

title: Hitman & Bodyguard 2 (2021)
description: The bodyguard Michael Bryce continues his friendship with assassin Darius Kincaid as they try to save Darius' wife Sonia.

title: Été 85 (2020)
description: French teenager Alexis's boat capsizes, and he is rescued by David, who ends up as his boyfriend.

title: The Sparks Brothers (2021)
description: A musical odyssey through five weird and wonderful decades with Ron and Russell Mael celebrating the inspiring legacy of Sparks.

title: Siberia (2019)
description: An exploration into the language of dreams.

title: Rita Moreno: Just a Girl Who Decided to Go for It (2021)
description: A look at the life and work of Rita Moreno from her humble beginnings in Puerto Rico to her success on Broadway and in Hollywood.

title: 12 Mighty Orphans (2021)
description: Haunted by his mysterious past, a devoted high school football coach leads a scrawny team of orphans to the state championship during the Great Depression and inspires a broken nation along the way.

title: The Birthday Cake (2021)
description: On the 10th anniversary of his father's death, Giovanni reluctantly accepts the task of bringing a cake to the home of his uncle, a mob boss, for a celebration. Just two hours into the night, Gio's life is forever changed.

title: The Serpent (2020)
description: Top special agent Lucinda Kavsky works for a secret part of the CIA. She's given a special assignment but then set up by her own agency.

title: Fast & Furious 9 (2021)
description: Dom and the crew must take on an international terrorist who turns out to be Dom and Mia's estranged brother.

title: Lansky (2021)
description: When the aging Meyer Lansky is investigated by the Feds, who suspect he has stashed away millions of dollars over half a century, the retired gangster reveals the untold truth about his life as the boss of the National Crime Syndicate.

title: Ice Road (2021)
description: After a remote diamond mine collapses in far northern Canada, a ‘big-rig’ ice road driver must lead an impossible rescue mission over a frozen ocean to save the trapped miners.
